means: <诗>伤害，损害（尤指使之枯萎）( scathe的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: He has been scathing in his denunciation of corrupt and incompetent politicians.
sentence.Network_cn: 他抨击起那些腐败无能的政客来一直都很尖刻犀利。

sentence.Network_en: He then launched a scathing attack on previous leaders.
sentence.Network_cn: 他接着严厉地斥责了几位前任领导者。

sentence.Network_en: His article is, predictably, a scathing attack on capitalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 可想而知，他的文章是对资本主义的严厉抨击。

list.abs: a scathing remark , rebuke , etc., 严厉的言语 , 指责等.
scathing limits can involve the Xiaoguan between film of muscle , ligament , muscle , vertebra joint of Qia of section , Di or lumbar Di joint .损伤的范围可涉及肌肉、韧带、筋膜、椎间小关节、骶髂关节或腰骶关节。
drew a scathing attack from somebody ., 遭某人强烈反驳.
"indictment"怎么说合适... ... separate indictment 独立公诉书; scathing indictment 严厉的控告; upon indictment 循公诉程序.

entry.def: If you say that someone is being scathing about something, you mean that they are being very critical of it.

example.ex: His report was scathing about Loyalist and Republican terror groups...
example.tran: 他的报告猛烈抨击了忠英派和共和军的恐怖组织。

example.ex: He then launched a scathing attack on previous leaders.
example.tran: 他接着严厉地斥责了几位前任领导者。

sentences.sentence: "his scathing remarks about silly lady novelists"

auth_sentence.content: I hold all religions in the same scathing contempt.
auth_sentence.res_content: I hold all religions in the same scathing contempt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I hold all religions in the same scathing contempt.

auth_sentence.content: Barbara's own response to such criticism is scathing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Barbara's own response to such criticism is scathing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Barbara's own response to such criticism is scathing.

auth_sentence.content: Her coverage was relentless, scathing, and prescient.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her coverage was relentless, scathing, and prescient.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her coverage was relentless, scathing, and prescient.

means.word_mean: (言词、文章)严厉的;尖刻的,不留情的

sentences.en: He made a scathing attack on the statement.
sentences.cn: 他对那声明进行了严厉的抨击。

sentences.en: Her speech was a scathing indictment of the government’s record on crime.
sentences.cn: 她的演讲强烈指责了政府在犯罪问题上的表现。
